thread.title: More Relaxing Than Yoga? Helicopter Yoga On a Deserted Island
thread.title_full: More Relaxing Than Yoga? Helicopter Yoga On a Deserted Island

title: More Relaxing Than Yoga? Helicopter Yoga On a Deserted Island
text:
Updated: 2:50 p.m. Wednesday, Aug. 26, 2015 | Posted: 10:34 a.m. Wednesday, Aug. 26, 2015 More Relaxing Than Yoga? Helicopter Yoga On a Deserted Island In Partnership with VisitFlorida.com 
A deserted island offers the perfect environment for yoga, right? Sun, sand, the sounds of wind and waves — the only problem is that deserted islands tend to be, you know, not so conveniently located. Enter heli-yoga. 
Enjoy an aerial meditation as a Str8 Up Aviation helicopter lifts you over a beautiful coastline and backwaters, landing at a remote, otherwise inaccessible location to enjoy a private instructor-led yoga practice. After a blissful savasana bathed in the sounds of your peaceful outdoor surroundings, healthy, organic refreshments are served before you take a stroll to enjoy the natural beauty — and then your exhilarating helicopter experience continues.
